thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Peter Franklin
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Peter Franklin

author: Peter Franklin
title: Peter Franklin
text: This is one of the best companies that I have ever dealt with. I live in the mountains of North Carolina and I am a Realtor who does professional real estate photography. I have had the opportunity to visit the store in Manhattan and I call frequently with questions. Everyone I have ever dealt with at B&H is extremely helpful, respectful and knowledgeable. In fact, I don't believe I could have gotten into this type of photography without their help and advice. I highly recommend these folks- they are good people.
